title_original: Drone Attacks Target Military Sites in Southern Iraq
content_original: By John Lee. Iraqi air defences have intercepted and shot down nine drones targeting military sites in Dhi Qar and Basra provinces, according to updates from the Joint Operations Command . Four drones were downed after attempting to strike a military location inside Imam Ali Air Base in Dhi Qar province. Two were intercepted at 22:50, with no casualties or material losses reported. In separate incidents, five additional drones were detected and destroyed while attempting to target military sites in Basra province. One earlier attempt to strike a military location in Basra resulted in a soldier being injured. In total, nine drones were intercepted across the reported incidents. Authorities confirmed that, aside from the one injured soldier, no further human or material losses were recorded. Investigations have been launched in line with established procedures. Separately, Jurf Al-Nasr in northern Babil province was subjected to two air strikes at 19:25. The authorities said they are clo...

And much of their leaders are gone.” His remarks follow earlier comments from Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, who said there were “many signs” that Khamenei had been killed in a strike on his compound during the joint US-Israeli campaign. Iranian media outlets have denied the reports.

title_original: 'Dubai's nightmare': Iranian strikes shatter calm of UAE business hub
content_original: 'Dubai's nightmare': Iranian strikes shatter calm of UAE business hub Iran  unleashed a furious missile and drone assault across the Arabian Gulf on Saturday in response to a surprise  US-Israeli attack , but one city in particular appeared to bear the  brunt  of it: Dubai. The Gulf emirate, one of seven in the  UAE , is the region’s good-time capital, where lucrative business deals can be sealed and celebrated. On Saturday, it was engulfed in billowing smoke and flames as missiles and drones rained down on it. The strikes have more than just geopolitical significance, denting Dubai's reputation for being an oasis of calm and commerce in the Middle East. Dubai has benefited potentially more than any other city in the world from the post-Covid boom of soaring asset prices, cryptocurrency, and remote work. Capitalising on its low tax rate and smooth bureaucracy, Dubai has become a magnet for London bankers and American “finance bros." Its financial institutions h...

title_original: 🇮🇱 🇺🇸 🇮🇷   On the Iran-Israel War:  /CIG/  #commentary Main takeaway is that the Iranian response was timely, instead...
content_original: 🇮🇱 🇺🇸 🇮🇷 On the Iran-Israel War: /CIG/ #commentary Main takeaway is that the Iranian response was timely, instead of the 24-48 hour wait last time. Pretty decent day one for Iran. Expected performance by the US et al. Global shipping might be the main casualty here. Unknown what will happen to oil & gas. The main damage caused by Iran et al in recent years was by shutting down the Suez. The US also appears to be shifting towards lower-cost kamikaze drones, taking a page out of Iran's book. Iran focused on radars and anything which aids interceptions. This is better than hitting symbolic buildings like last time. They're taking taking big hits and their leadership may or may not be dead, but they prepared for decentralized military coordination. So it's like a unit by unit basis of commanders making self authorized decisions. Main US military impact is that this will functionally use up the remainder of munitions that would have been used on China. Also the US is not invading Iran shock...

The US is also noted to be adopting Iran's kamikaze drone tactics, reflecting a shift in military strategy.

title_original: Netanyahu says Iran war to continue ‘as long as necessary’, claims Khamenei likely killed
content_original: Netanyahu says Iran war to continue ‘as long as necessary’, claims Khamenei likely killed Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has issued his first statement since launching the war on Iran. “This fateful operation will continue as long as necessary - patience is needed. This war will bring about true peace,” Netanyahu claimed on Saturday evening. He also appeared to reference reports of an attempt on the life of Iran’s Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei. “We destroyed the compound of the dictator Khamenei. There are many signs that this dictator is gone,” he said. In a direct message to Iranians, Netanyahu urged public unrest. “To the citizens of Iran - do not miss the opportunity. Your moment will soon come to take to the streets, complete the task, and overthrow the regime that is making your lives miserable.”
title_en: Netanyahu says Iran war to continue ‘as long as necessary’, claims Khamenei likely killed
summary_en: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu announced that the war against Iran will continue until deemed necessary and suggested that Iran’s Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei may have been killed in an attack on his compound. classification.brief: The interception of ballistic missiles over Jordan highlights the regional spillover of the Iran–US conflict and the persistent threat to neighboring countries' security.

title_en: US Strikes PMF Headquarters in Baghdad
summary_en: The US has targeted a PMF (Popular Mobilization Forces) headquarters in Baghdad, Iraq. This strike is part of ongoing US operations against Iran-backed militias in the region. The attack signifies continued US efforts to counter proxy forces threatening its interests in Iraq.

classification.brief: The US airstrike on a PMF headquarters in Baghdad demonstrates ongoing efforts to counter Iran-backed militias, escalating tensions in Iraq.

title_en: UAE Reports Missile Attack from Iran and Intercepts
summary_en: The UAE claims it was targeted by a missile attack from Iran and successfully intercepted the missiles. This incident signifies an escalation in regional hostilities and direct engagement between Iran and a US ally, raising concerns about further conflict in the Gulf region.

classification.brief: Iran's missile attack on the UAE, a key US ally, represents a direct escalation in regional hostilities and raises the risk of broader conflict in the Gulf region.

title_original: איראן משגרת איום ישיר לעבר ישראל וארה"ב: "אין קווים אדומים"
content_original: גורם איראני בכיר הצהיר כי "אין קווים אדומים" וכי כל הנכסים והאינטרסים האמריקאיים והישראליים במזרח התיכון הם מטרה לגיטימית. משמרות המהפכה הודיעו כי החל גל ראשון של מתקפות טילים וכטב"מים כתגובה למתקפה
title_en: Iran Threatens Israel and US: 'No Red Lines'
summary_en: A senior Iranian official declared that there are 'no red lines' and that all US and Israeli assets and interests in the Middle East are legitimate targets. The IRGC announced the start of a first wave of missile and drone attacks in response to a previous strike, indicating a significant escalation in the ongoing conflict.

classification.brief: Iran's declaration of 'no red lines' and initiation of missile and drone attacks against US and Israeli assets marks a significant escalation in the conflict.

title_original: إيران ترد برشقات صاروخية على كيان الاحتلال
content_original: المركز الفلسطيني للإعلام بدأت إيران الرد على العدوان الأمريكي الإسرائيلي، بإطلاق موجة من الصواريخ الباليستية صوب أهداف في كيان الاحتلال. وأعلن الحرس الثوري الإيراني في بيان: ردًا على عدوان العدو المعتدي والقاتل على الجمهورية الإسلامية الإيرانية، بدأت أول موجة من الهجمات الصاروخية والطائرات المسيرة الواسعة للجمهورية الإسلامية الإيرانية نحو الأراضي المحتلة. وقالت مواقع عبرية، إن صفارات الإنذار دوت في جميع مدن إسرائيل مع صدور تعليمات بالدخول إلى الملاجئ، بعد إعلان حالة “طوارئ خاصة”. وأورد موقع والا الإسرائيلي أن أصوات الانفجارات سُمعت في منطقة حيفا، كما ذكرت وسائل إعلام إسرائيلية أخرى دوي انفجارات قوية في منطقة الجليل شمال إسرائيل. وتحدثث وسائل إعلام عبرية عن إسقاط صاروخ في سماء تل أبيب، وسقوط صاروخين في منطقة مفتوحة أخرى شمال فلسطين المحتلة. ولاحقا أقرت وسائل إعلام عبرية باستهدف مبنى مباشرة في عسقلان ومبنى في تل أبيب. وفي تطور لاحق، رصدت وسائل إعلام انطلاق موجة صواريخ إيرانية جديدة على كيان الاحتلال. الحرب على إيران .. هجمات إسرائيلية وأميركية على طهران وفي أول تعليق على الحر...
title_en: Iran launches ballistic missile barrage at Israel
summary_en: Iran's IRGC launched ballistic missiles and drones targeting Israel in response to US-Israeli aggression against Iran. Air raid sirens sounded across Israeli cities, with reports of explosions in Haifa and the Galilee region. This escalation signifies a significant expansion of the conflict with potential regional implications.

classification.brief: Iran's ballistic missile barrage against Israel marks a critical escalation, directly involving Iran in the conflict and posing significant regional security risks.

title_original: Lebanon refuses to be drawn into Iran conflict: PM
content_original: Lebanese Prime Minister Nawaf Salam said Saturday that his country refused to be dragged into war, after Israel and the United States launched strikes against Iran. Authorities fear the Iran-backed Lebanese militant group Hezbollah could become involved in the conflict, which saw the US and Israel bomb Iran on Saturday and Tehran respond with missile attacks. Just before the operation began, Israel announced it was carrying out strikes on Hezbollah infrastructure in south Lebanon.
title_en: Lebanon refuses to be drawn into Iran conflict: PM
summary_en: Lebanese Prime Minister Nawaf Salam stated that Lebanon will not be drawn into the ongoing conflict after US and Israeli strikes on Iran, amid concerns that Hezbollah might get involved. Israel preemptively struck Hezbollah infrastructure in south Lebanon before the operation began. This highlights Lebanon's efforts to avoid escalation and the potential for regional spillover as the conflict intensifies.

classification.brief: Israel's preemptive strikes on Hezbollah infrastructure in Lebanon signal potential escalation risks as Lebanon seeks to avoid involvement in the broader Iran conflict.

title_original: כל המדינה במקלטים: אחרי מתקפת המנע - ישראל תחת מתקפה נרחבת מאיראן
content_original: אזעקות נשמעו בכל הארץ בעקבות זיהוי שיגור טילים לעבר שטח המדינה. "הציבור מתבקש לגלות אחריות ולפעול על פי ההנחיות - הן מצילות חיים", מסר פיקוד העורף
title_en: Israel Under Wide-Ranging Attack from Iran After Missile Barrage
summary_en: Iran launched a widespread missile attack on Israel, triggering nationwide air raid sirens and prompting the Home Front Command to urge citizens to follow safety protocols. This represents a significant escalation in the ongoing conflict between Iran and Israel, with potential regional implications.

classification.brief: Iran's ballistic missile attack on Israel marks a critical escalation, posing a direct threat to regional stability and potentially drawing in US forces.

title_original: אזעקות בישראל: התרעות נשמעו באזורים נרחבים בצפון בעקבות שיגור מאיראן
content_original: אזעקות נשמעו באזורים נרחבים בצפון ישראל בעקבות זיהוי שיגור טילים לעבר שטח המדינה. "הציבור מתבקש לגלות אחריות ולפעול על פי ההנחיות - הן מצילות חיים", מסר פיקוד העורף
title_en: Missile Alerts in Northern Israel Triggered by Suspected Iranian Launch
summary_en: Missile alerts were activated across northern Israel following the detection of missile launches from Iran towards Israeli territory. The Home Front Command urged citizens to follow safety protocols, emphasizing that they save lives. This incident signifies a significant escalation in the ongoing conflict between Israel and Iran, highlighting the direct threat under which Israeli civilians are placed.

classification.brief: Iran's ballistic missile launch towards Israel represents a significant escalation, posing a direct threat to Israeli territory and civilians.

title_original: תיעוד: הותקפו פירים תת-קרקעיים של חיזבאללה בדרום לבנון
content_original: בצה"ל אמרו כי עמדות השיגור שהותקפו לצד הפירים התת-קרקעיים של ארגון הטרור שימשו אותו ל"קידום מתווי טרור". בצבא הזהירו כי "חיזבאללה פועל לשקם את הארגון - ומפר את ההבנות"
title_en: IDF strikes Hezbollah underground tunnels in southern Lebanon
summary_en: The IDF targeted Hezbollah underground tunnels and launch positions in southern Lebanon, citing their use for 'terror activities.' The military warned that Hezbollah is attempting to rebuild and violating previous understandings, indicating ongoing tensions and potential escalation in the region.

classification.brief: The IDF airstrikes on Hezbollah tunnels in southern Lebanon indicate ongoing tensions and potential escalation in the Israel-Lebanon border region, which could impact the broader Iran–US conflict through Hezbollah's role as an Iranian proxy.

title_original: מתקפת המנע של ארה"ב וישראל באיראן: "אלפי הרוגים במשמרות המהפכה"
content_original: ישראל וארה"ב פתחו במתקפת מנע נגד איראן - הוכרז מצב חירום מיוחד ומיידי בכל שטחי המדינה. הותקפו מוקדים משמעותיים בטהרן, כולל מוקדי שלטון. טראמפ: "יצאנו למלחמה. לא יהיה נשק גרעיני"
title_en: US and Israel Launch Preventive Attack on Iran: 'Thousands of IRGC Casualties'
summary_en: The US and Israel have initiated a preventive attack on Iran, with Tehran's key centers, including government facilities, targeted. A state of emergency has been declared across Iran. The attack aims to prevent Iran's nuclear capabilities, with President Trump stating the objective is to ensure Iran does not acquire nuclear weapons.

classification.brief: The US and Israel launched a coordinated airstrike on Iran targeting government facilities and IRGC centers, marking a significant escalation in the conflict with mass casualties reported.

title_original: Syrian teen killed in Israeli airstrike in eastern Lebanon
content_original: A Syrian teen was killed and 29 others injured Thursday in Israeli airstrikes in eastern Lebanon despite a ceasefire deal that has been in place since November 2024, Lebanese state media reported, Anadolu reports. The National News Agency (NNA) said a 17-year-old boy was killed in the strike that targeted the Beit Mshik farms area near Kfar Dan in western Baalbek. The fatality came as Israeli warplanes launched a series of airstrikes targeting the western Baalbek area, with fighter jets flying at low altitude above the region. The Israeli army said the strikes targeted infrastructure belonging to the Lebanese group Hezbollah’s “Radwan Force” in the Baalbek area. In southern Lebanon, an Israeli drone carried out a strike with a guided […]
title_en: Syrian teen killed in Israeli airstrike in eastern Lebanon
summary_en: An Israeli airstrike in eastern Lebanon killed a Syrian teenager and injured 29 others near Kfar Dan in Baalbek. The strikes targeted Hezbollah's 'Radwan Force' infrastructure in the area, violating the existing ceasefire deal since November 2024. This incident highlights ongoing tensions and potential escalation between Israel and Hezbollah despite the ceasefire.

classification.brief: The Israeli airstrike targeting Hezbollah's 'Radwan Force' infrastructure in Lebanon, despite the ceasefire, signifies ongoing tensions and potential escalation in the region, indirectly impacting the Iran–US conflict through Hezbollah's role as an Iranian proxy.
